Name: Penguin Park 3D
About the game: Take care of a bunch of penguins! Feed them fish, clean their poo and give them party hats! Make them do tricks to earn money, and buy eggs to get more penguins. Make sure they don't die or your park will be closed! Can you breed 10 penguins before you're laid off? Features Around 30 minutes of gameplay Feed cute penguins Breed baby penguins Day-night cycle Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
